text: The Jylgyndy Forest Reserve (Kyrgyz: Жылгынды заказниги)) is located in Nooken District of Jalal-Abad Region of Kyrgyzstan. It was established in 1975 with a purpose of conservation of pistachio (Pistacia vera) habitat. The forest reserve occupies 300 hectares. ==References== Category:Jalal-Abad Region Category:Protected areas of Kyrgyzstan Category:Protected areas established in 1975 Category:Forest reserves of Kyrgyzstan
title: Jylgyndy Forest Reserve
